unnormalised: ## EV Charging: No More Range Anxiety, Yaar!
normalised: ## E V Charging: No More Range Anxiety, Yaar!

unnormalised: So, you're thinking of going electric, eh? Awesome! Welcome to the future, my friend. But let's be real, the first question everyone asks is: "Charging kahaan se karenge?" (Where will we charge?). Don't worry, range anxiety is becoming a thing of the past, especially in India.
normalised: So, you're thinking of going electric, eh? Awesome! Welcome to the future, my friend. But let's be real, the first question everyone asks is: "Charging kahaan se karenge?" (Where will we charge?). Don't worry, range anxiety is becoming a thing of the past, especially in India.

unnormalised: Gone are the days of frantically searching for a petrol pump. EV charging infrastructure is slowly but surely spreading across the country. Think of it like this: it's like when your mom makes extra biryani for Onam - you know you'll be covered!
normalised: Gone are the days of frantically searching for a petrol pump. E V charging infrastructure is slowly but surely spreading across the country. Think of it like this: it's like when your mom makes extra biryani for Onam - you know you'll be covered!

unnormalised: We're seeing charging stations pop up at malls like Phoenix Marketcity, office buildings, and even some chai stalls along the highway from Mumbai to Pune! Companies like Tata Power and Ather Energy are heavily investing in setting up charging grids.
normalised: We're seeing charging stations pop up at malls like Phoenix Marketcity, office buildings, and even some chai stalls along the highway from Mumbai to Pune! Companies like Tata Power and Ather Energy are heavily investing in setting up charging grids.

unnormalised: *   **At Home:** Your most convenient option! Get a charger installed at your house in Delhi. Overnight charging is the way to go. Think of it as like plugging in your phone.
normalised: *   **At Home:** Your most convenient option! Get a charger installed at your house in Delhi. Overnight charging is the way to go. Think of it as like plugging in your phone.

unnormalised: *   **Public Charging Stations:** These are popping up everywhere, from Bangalore to Chennai. You'll find fast chargers (DC) and slow chargers (AC).
normalised: *   **Public Charging Stations:** These are popping up everywhere, from Bangalore to Chennai. You'll find fast chargers (D C) and slow chargers (A C).

unnormalised: *   **Workplace Charging:** Many companies in Gurgaon are offering charging points for their employees. This is a great perk!
normalised: *   **Workplace Charging:** Many companies in Gurgaon are offering charging points for their employees. This is a great perk!

unnormalised: Charging costs vary depending on the provider and the type of charger. Expect to pay anywhere from Rs. 8 to Rs. 20 per unit. A full charge might cost you around Rs. 500 - Rs. 800, depending on your EV's battery size. Still cheaper than petrol, right?
normalised: Charging costs vary depending on the provider and the type of charger. Expect to pay anywhere from rupee eight to rupee twenty per unit. A full charge might cost you around rupee five hundred - rupee eight hundred, depending on your E V's battery size. Still cheaper than petrol, right?

unnormalised: Most modern EVs offer a range of 300-400 km on a single charge. That's plenty for your daily commute and even a weekend trip to Lonavala. And the range is only getting better!
normalised: Most modern E Vs offer a range of three hundred to four hundred kilometer on a single charge. That's plenty for your daily commute and even a weekend trip to Lonavala. And the range is only getting better!

unnormalised: So, don't let charging concerns hold you back. The EV revolution is here, and it's getting easier and more convenient to power your ride every single day. Think electric, think future, and maybe, just maybe, think about the delicious biryani you'll be able to afford with all the money you'll save!
normalised: So, don't let charging concerns hold you back. The E V revolution is here, and it's getting easier and more convenient to power your ride every single day. Think electric, think future, and maybe, just maybe, think about the delicious biryani you'll be able to afford with all the money you'll save!
